summary: An Ordinance of the City of Seattle, granting to the Great Northern Railway Company, its successors and assigns, the right, privilege and authority to lay down, construct, maintain and operate one tract of standard gauge railway, together with all needful crossovers and connections between said tract and any other tracts adjacent thereto, in, upon and across Connecticut Street in said city, and granting to said company, its successors and assigns, a right of way therefor.
